title: Sold - Rare Rose Co. postcard of Smith, Chicago, A.L.
author: ramram

posts.post_title: Sold - Rare Rose Co. postcard of Smith, Chicago, A.L.
posts.post_content:
1908-09 Rose Company post card.  There is reportedly only one other known Rose card of this particular Smith card.  Lowered to $sold ppd.  (check or m.o.)  

If you are unfamiliar with these cards and their rarity, go to this website for an interesting read (scroll to the very bottom for the checklist and population number):

[url]http://www.sportscollectorsdigest.com/set-overview-1908-09-rose-company-postcards/[/url]

Rob M
